Ames.Milford Township, Story County, Iowa:
Milford Township is a township in Story County, Iowa, USA. As of the 2000 census, its population was 569.


== Geography ==
Milford Township covers an area of 37.2 square miles (96 km2) and contains a small portion of the incorporated town of Ames. According to the USGS, it contains four cemeteries: Brouhard Cemetery, Evergreen Memory Gardens, Knoll Cemetery and Pleasant Grove Cemetery.
